oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from L. F. Acuff to Gov. Buford Ellington
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter of support for Highlander Folk School by L. F. Acuff, of Chattanooga, Tennessee. Acuff accused the investigative committee of making their minds up before beginning the investigation and of lacking specific proven charges. He asked why they brought an investigator in from Arkansas while decrying "outside interference" of those who don't agree with them.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Resolutions, Legislative; Investigations; Charters; Communism
